Package managers

Class StudentSystem

java.lang.Object
managers.AbstractSystem
managers.StudentSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
CourseSystemInterface, Systems
public class StudentSystem
extends AbstractSystem
implements CourseSystemInterface
Controller for the student system. Used to pass selectedStudent inputs from UI classes to entity manager classes Also used to invoke entity manager methods based on selectedStudent actions from UI classes

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class managers.AbstractSystem

    calendarMgr, courseMgr, selectedCourse, selectedIndex, selectedStudent, studentManager

    • StudentSystem

      public StudentSystem​(java.lang.String userId) throws FileReadingException, KeyNotFoundException
      Constructor NOTE: selectedStudent defaults to the user, since the user is always of interest
      Parameters:
      userId - UserID of student selectedStudent logging into system
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if student file of selectedStudent cannot be accessed
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if student details cannot be found

      format - Desired format of course information
      Returns:

      Returns:

      selectCourse in interface CourseSystemInterface
      Parameters:
      courseCode - course code of the course
      Throws:

    • selectIndex

      public void selectIndex​(java.lang.String indexNo) throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException
      Method to select an index used for other methods See CourseSystemInterface.selectIndex(String) method
      Specified by:
      selectIndex in interface CourseSystemInterface
      Parameters:
      indexNo - index number of the index
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - Used if no indexes match the given index number can be found for the course
      MissingSelectionException - Used if the course has not yet been selected

    • getSystemStatus

      public java.lang.String getSystemStatus()
      Method to check current objects selected by system 1. Course 2. Index 3. Student Blank fields indicate no selected made See Systems.getSystemStatus() method
      Specified by:
      getSystemStatus in interface Systems
      Returns:
      String describing state of system

    • clearSelections

      public void clearSelections()
      Method to clear all previously made selections See Systems.clearSelections() method NOTE: selectedStudent will not be cleared as it always refers to the user
      Specified by:
      clearSelections in interface Systems

    • getTimeTable

      public java.lang.String getTimeTable() throws FileReadingException
      Method to view the timetable for the selectedStudent's registered courses
      Returns:
      Timetable formatted as a String
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if problems are found with student's data

    • addCourse

      public int addCourse() throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException, MissingParametersException, InvalidInputException
      Method to register user for a course
      Returns:
      int denoting status of registration (1. Registration successful, 0. Waitlisted)
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if index selected is not under course selected
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course or index have not been selected
      MissingParametersException - thrown if course or index have not been selected or selectedStudent is invalid
      InvalidInputException - thrown if student cannot register for the course

    • dropCourse

      public void dropCourse() throws InvalidInputException, MissingParametersException, KeyNotFoundException
      Method to allow student user to drop course
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - thrown if student has not registered for selected course
      MissingParametersException - thrown if course or index have not been selected
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if selected index is not under selected course

    • checkVacanciesAvailable

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer[]> checkVacanciesAvailable() throws MissingSelectionException
      Method to check vacancies available for selected course
      Returns:
      HashMap of vacancies for all courses. Course code are used as keys, slots available stored as values
      Throws:
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course has yet to be selected

    • swopIndexWithStudent

      public void swopIndexWithStudent​(java.lang.String identifier) throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException, InvalidInputException, OutOfRangeException
      Method to swop index with another student
      Parameters:
      identifier - String identifier of student other than selectedStudent to swop with
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - If either student has not registered for course
      MissingSelectionException - If course to swop has not been selected
      InvalidInputException - thrown if student tries to swop with self
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if timetable clash is detected, preventing swop

    • swopToIndex

      public void swopToIndex() throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException, MissingParametersException, InvalidInputException
      Method to change to another index for the selected course
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if chosen index does not exist for the selected course
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if either course or index has not been selected
      MissingParametersException - thrown if either course or index has not been selected
      InvalidInputException - thrown if selectedStudent is not registered for course, already in the new index, new index is full, or timetable clashes

    • checkAddClash

      private boolean checkAddClash​(Student student) throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException
      Method to check whether or not for a particular student, adding the selected index will result in a clash
      Parameters:
      student - student to be checked
      Returns:
      true if a clash is detected, false otherwise
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if an index under student is found to not be under the course stated
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if an index is yet to be selected

    • checkSwopClash

      private boolean checkSwopClash​(Student student, Index newIndex) throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException
      Method to check if swopping to a new index
      Parameters:
      student - Student to check
      newIndex - Index to be swopped to
      Returns:
      true if a clash is detected. false otherwise
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if an index under student is found to not be under the course stated
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course or index is yet to be selected
